Body: I have set allow_anonymous " to false in the configuration file and have created a new password file using the mosquitto_passwd utility
column9:
but still the client is able to connect through any username and password.

what should i do ?

"

Body: Update the question with the start of the output when you start mosquitto and the content of your config file
issue resolved we were correcting the wrong file and did not upload the config file after editing
we didn't know that u have to upload the new configuration file every time while running mosquitto
password_file MUST not be empty. Or password is not required. Maybe can help you
